message: Hi Stephen, thanks for such a great post! I do have several questions, though. I posted them on Stack Overflow for more visibility ([https://stackoverflow.com/questions/48346489/using-concurrentexclusiveschedulerpair-as-an-async-readerwriterlock-equivalent)](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/48346489/using-concurrentexclusiveschedulerpair-as-an-async-readerwriterlock-equivalent)) and I'd be grateful if you could take a look if you find some time. Thanks!
